website_summaries.verdict: A high-end flat iron with a solid reputation that offers a digital temperature display and titanium plates.
pros: Offers professional features such as super-smooth plates
It has 25 heat settings and a precise system to maintain heat to avoid scorching hair
The nano-silver technology offers sanitation and deodorization benefits
Keeps your hair smelling fresh and clean
cons: Not great for flat-iron curls, since the edges get very hot

customer_reviews.title: Best straightener!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely thick, curly, and coarse hair and I've tried so many straighteners (Paul Michell, Chi, etc.) and none of them have worked well on my hair. My hair stylist uses this straightener and every time she does my hair it comes out so silky and straight. I finally bought it for myself and it works wonders. Just be careful because it gets HOT - even with my coarse and curly hair I only put it to 410, so I recommend starting lower than you think and working up from there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it...but stopped working after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this back in March and loved it! It works great, heats up quickly and turns itself off after about 30 minutes of not using it. Unfortunately, I had the same issue as many and it stopped working after 8 months of daily use. There was no warning and it just stopped heating up one day. My previous flat irons (CHI & Rusk) have lasted for years. I did order another unit in November because I liked it so much. Fingers crossed this one lasts at least one year.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works fast and very well on my long wavy hair! This flat iron makes my hair is shiny and straight in a quick amount of time, I do not have to go over sections more than 2 times, if it even takes 2! The digital temperature control makes it very easy to use. The flat iron is lightweight so my hand does not get tired while doing my hair and the cord length is long. This is one of the best straighteners I have ever used, I strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Damage and used item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and I received and it looks like used the item have oil around definitely I love this product but they send me something damage nd used..I turn on and is no heat up...sorry but I need this item and it doesn't work...i returned the item same day i received...
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thick & curly hair! Natural shine no frizz
customer_reviews.text: Will never let ceramic touch my hair again. Only titanium blades! Got this flatiron when my “Keratin Complex” flat iron died 6years in. This croc flat iron was half the price and I was unsure about its quality. But it’s been almost 2 years it’s still holding up great! The negative charged ions in a titanium flat iron give the hair a natural shine. I have really long, thick & curly hair. And only have to pass the flatiron through each piece twice before moving on the the next. Love this flat iron and will purchase another Croc flatiron before going back to the more expensive keratin complex flat iron. They’re basically the same the croc is just more affordable
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flat Iron for Course Frizzy Hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this flat iron. My hair stylist uses it!! It heats up super quickly and I only need to run it through my wavy hair once to get beautiful straight hair. Definitely recommend it. And, no frizzy hair after you use this!! I have course frizzy wavy hair and this flat iron is a blessing when I can't tame the frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Vera Brown

customer_reviews.title: Product safety seal broken and made hissing sound!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this product arrived within 24 hours! However, when I opened the Amazon packaging, the safety seal on the Croc product box was already broken. That was the first problem. Second, the product made a hissing/humming noise when plugged in. I have had several Croc flat irons, so I knew what to expect. I returned this product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi W.

customer_reviews.title: I like the flat iron performance
customer_reviews.text: I like the flat iron performance, but I'm not as pleased as I was with my old Croc. This one comes with the grip handle as it is uncomfortable to hold. It has a pattern that makes gripping it harder with the feel of the rubber against the web of my hand between my thumb to first finger. The iron comes on at 410 and cannot be preset to a specific number as my old one. I do like that the iron is wider and it does a more than adequate job, but I really am not pleased about the grip or the temp control.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Sue

customer_reviews.title: Don't last
customer_reviews.text: So this product was recommended for me yet I decided to give it a try . Sii had it for 1 year and now is not working for the value of this iron I thought it will last longer now it doesn't heat up I turn it on waiting for the temperature to go up and ends up with a Error message and turns off. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Fany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase. Item defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flat iron here on Amazon as a gift for my Mom because I already have this same one that I purchased from a hair salon. I’m very disappointed with this purchase. When you plug hers in, it sounds like a spaceship taking off. Something clearly wrong with it; she did not tell me because she didn’t realize anything was wrong. Wasn’t until I came to visit and plugged it in that I see it doesn’t work well & sounds very strange
customer_reviews.author: Christine Roof

customer_reviews.title: This does not perform like a croc! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Please listen to the reviews regarding the metal plates on this flat iron. It snags my hair and makes it look fried. This is not like the crocs I’ve used in the past. Please don’t waste your money on this product. I’m sadly 2 days past being able to return it. Money wasted!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A great flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 3 or 4 years ago but it stopped working. Decided to order it again because it straightens my thin hair great without damaging it. I’ve had a few other flat irons before the Croc Classic Nano but none of them can compare. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Mar

customer_reviews.title: croc classic nano
customer_reviews.text: before purchasing this item i read reviews about the straightener making a noise when it was on. and YES it was true. i used it 2-3 times and i noticed a sound when it was on. SO i returned it and bought the same kind from the actual Croc website and it doesnt make that sound.
customer_reviews.author: yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several brands of professional flat irons over the years. I have curly, thick hair and use a flat iron daily. Options that I love: *swivel cord *digital temp setting *comfortable handle *heats quickly and auto shut off *Does not damage my hair and keeps it looking shiny
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Andrepont Harrigill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: It's the only flat iron my wife will use. I have purchased many other flat irons for my wife over the last 10 years but this one has proven to be the most reliable. Yes, I have had to purchase a new one for her a couple of times and yes, they are quite pricey if you compare them to ones you can buy at Target or Walmart. The fact of the matter is, they simply last longer and hold up better than the cheaper ones so they are will worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Quick heat
customer_reviews.text: Love the super fast heat up. Auto shuts off for those of us who question if we remembered to turn the straightener off. Glides through hair easily, no pulling.
customer_reviews.author: kbooker

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk and very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 3 months ago after using my friend's croc and loving it. I went to use it this morning (like every other morning) and it warmed up to desired temperature and then the temperature started dropping. I can not get the flat iron to warm up anymore. This item is complete junk and I will just stick to my Paul Mitchell!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Croc Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Croc Flat Iron; it gets my wavy/frizzy hair straighter than any other iron I have tried, even without having to dial it up to the 450 degree setting. I'm only upset that the Croc compny will not warranty the product as it is sold by Amazon and not a beauty supply shop. Be sure and by Amazon's extended warranty policy, which isn't expensive, for piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Kelley

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I bought this b/c I used my mother's a couple times and fell in love with it. It heats up insanely fast, has several heat options, and I have had minimal heat damage (none I've noticed) to my hair. My sister also used our mother's and is going to purchase one of these. The best either of us has used! I should note though that I do NOT use this thing at the highest heat setting. I heat it to 290 and that is DEFINITELY hot enough to do the job. This Croc gets really hot and I wouldn't ever use it on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron
customer_reviews.text: Amazing flat iron! I had the older model for a long time but I dropped it too much and had to replace it and I am so glad I did! This new model works even better! Very easy to use and heats up super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Z.

customer_reviews.title: USELESS WARRANTY DUE TO AMAZON BEING AN UNAUTHORIZED RETAILER
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the recommendation of my stylist. Unfortunately, it stopped working in less than a year. Upon reading the warranty, I discovered that is is no good if you purchase it on Amazon, because they consider Amazon an "unauthorized retailer!!" This is not a cheap straightener, and I would like a replacement sent to me or a full refund!.
customer_reviews.author: elf69

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great. It heats up almost immediately. Very happy with my Croc flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Best flat iron out there especially if you have ethnic
customer_reviews.text: Best flat iron out there especially if you have ethnic, curly and thick hair! Nothing else works like this. I just wish these lasted as long as they used to, this is my 4th one and they seem to last less and less. I have been using these since they came out and have tried others in between (expensive ones too) when these break and I just keep going back to his one. Enough said!
customer_reviews.author: LHG

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast & works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to splurge on an expensive hair straightener, and this was a fantastic purchase. It heats up quickly and I feel confident that it will safely turn off if for some reason I forget to unplug it. I have thick wavy hair, and this straightener just works magic on the first pass. My hair has never straightened so quickly! I even reduced the temperature to 400 degrees (from 450) to ensure no split ends, and is leaves my hair silky. It doesn't snag on hair at all. LOVE IT! I debated buying ceramic vs. titanium and do not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: My flat Iron lasted less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed. I bought this flat iron in Sept 2018 and it worked really well until it suddenly died this month. It didn’t even last a year and it died on me. $177 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Boiling hot
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find a hotter one ! A little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ann

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware...
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best straightening iron I have ever used. However - it doesn't last. I have had it for 8 months and it is dead. I use it about once a week. Buyer Beware - Croc will NOT honor your warranty if you buy their product on Amazon. What??? I'll bet the majority of their product is sold on Amazon - interesting that they don't want to warrant this product from their largest retailers. I won't buy another one - at this price, I would expect it to work longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iron does not work well and makes a hissing sound.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Iron and did not use until a few days ago. Needless to say the window for return has passed. The first time I used the iron, it made a buzzing sounds and was smoking. My room was filled with smoke, I haven’t used again since purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron for my 20 year old daughter (she has long, thick hair) - she absolutely loves it - the best one she's ever had. The product is exactly as described and was shipped and received quickly. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this does not heat up to the 400+ it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Croc Hair Straigtener
customer_reviews.text: I have had Croc brand hair straighteners in the past and had no issues. This one does not seem to run as hot. I have to turn up the heat a bit higher than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Goetsch

customer_reviews.title: Had to return! FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it stopped working... after I consulted Croc was informed it was most likely a fake...
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Product broke within 6 months of buying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and after using only a handful of times (maybe 20 over a 6 month period) the straightener stopped working. I had purchased this straightener from another seller prior, and the product lasted approximately 2 years. I would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: joan glick

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this straightener, and she’s was right. Works great. I have naturally curly hair, and when I use this straightener, you wouldn’t be able to tell. It’s light and ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Lara-Cruz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TRUST THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: this product was received in a USED manner, dirty, and the heating plate was out of the straightner, completely shocked and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shortone74

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Straightens my hair so quickly. Love it it has auto shut off. My daughter loves it also. She is 14 and she approves :)
customer_reviews.author: tarafrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Stairghtener
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Helped with frizz and I have super curly hair and no problem straightening it :)
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure to take care of it after every use wipe it down
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I received my flat iron it works like wonders it took me half time of straightening my hair and I didn’t have to use no chemicals or anything just shampoo and conditioner and air dry it and then straighten it and it kept a chain in my hair amazing
customer_reviews.author: Dora May Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the first flat iron I’ve had that does the best job. No need for extra pass through sand it normally lasts me 2 days. Heats up quickly as well
customer_reviews.author: Merlynn McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this flat iron for my wife over a 1 1/2 years ago. She is happy that it still works because others posted that theirs stopped working. My wife uses it at every 6-7 weeks when she S-Curl (a texturizer) her African-American hair. The S-Curl of course makes her hair wavy, but she prefers her hair straight. Well, this flat iron hasn't disappointed her yet, it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one I have from years back that ...
customer_reviews.text: It really straightens your hair!! Better than the one I have from years back that then was the best one out there!!!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Short Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this straightener while it lasted. It did not pull on my hair while straightening and heated up quickly. I had this straightener for a year and a month when it started to malfunction. It would turn off every time I clamped the straightener shut. I just wish it had a longer lifespan for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bree mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: This Croc was just what I hoped it would be and worked just like I wanted. My hair is soft and strait. No damage so far. I set it on 350 but it goes hotter then that. It does not pull my hair and I have not burned myself. It heats up fast enough that you are not waiting and waiting. I have had it only about 1 month but really like it so far. It feels well made and the cord feels strong. I really like the look and feel of it. It looks nice in my bathroom, :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best straightner I have ever owned my hair is so straight shiny and smooth took me half the time and I will never go back to ceramic plates
customer_reviews.author: amf

customer_reviews.title: Second one I bought
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron. Heats up fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: rise d edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present and loved it. Two and a half months later - will not even turn on. Stopped working completely. Return window closed January 31 and product support on March 6th. Totally will change the way I purchase hair products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Andr

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I'd had my previous flat iron for a very long time and was afraid I'd never like another one as much. When it finally wore out, I started using this Croc and I love it. I would have thrown my old one out sooner if I'd known how much I would prefer this iron.
customer_reviews.author: Petmom

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Straightener for 10 Years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal Croc customer for almost 10 years - there’s a reason I just keep coming back to the same product! Even though it’s a bit on the pricey side and there’s a ton of competition with a much less price tag, it’s worth every penny in my opinion..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RECEVIED THIS PRODUCT AND IT LOOKED LIKE IT HAD BEEN OPENED AND VERY LIKELY USED
customer_reviews.text: RECEVIED THIS PRODUCT AND IT LOOKED LIKE IT HAD BEEN OPENED AND VERY LIKELY USED. THIS IS RIDICULOUS AND DISAPPOINTED. THANKS A LOT AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best flat iron I have ever used! A bit pricey but definitely worth it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: This is a great straightener!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this! My plan was to purchase a Keratin Complex but they're so expensive. I read a lot of reviews from several different straighteners. I opted to give this one a try and I'm pleasantly pleased. My hair is very easy to straighten but one of my girls hair is very thick and wavy. It works great for us all. Love it & very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it stopped working 6 months later.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this flat iron in June, and it stopped working in 6 months. It powers on and turns off every 30 seconds. I would recommend that you do not purchase from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: ASadeN

customer_reviews.title: Best Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast and shows you the temp so you can control the heat level you are using
customer_reviews.author: elena hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product. I would Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My Hair Stylist utilizes the Croc Classic for her Salon. I liked the ease and style the Croc Classic produced and ordered one through Amazon. I have had Great Success by being able to Style my own hair and having the Style hold. It is the First Flat Iron that I have ever purchased that has maintained the straightness that I have tried for years to control, especially since I have Naturally Curly Hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: One of the best flat irons I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best flat irons I have ever used! The best part is I can straighten by curly hair and it will remain straight for 3 days without having to retouch it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, black plates!
customer_reviews.text: Product is not as described. This croc is a "classic premium" with black plates....not as described as the classic with silver plates. I used once...seems a little less hot than the silver plates.
customer_reviews.author: Lena P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Iron!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iron. I have actually already dropped it and it's still like new. No problems at all (knock on wood) ;) I love how fast it straightens my hair and my hair actually stays straight! I used to have an iron just like it but, it broke so I bought the Croc. I have only good things to say. I use it on 420- 430 because sometimes 450 is too hot. I am Cuban and have really kinky curly and full hair...it works wonders! Definitely a great buy!!!! My sister has very thick wavy hair and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Krysten Zayas

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I have an Amika Hair Straightener and by mistake I left it in Kolkata when I went to visit last Dec. I needed one and based on all the Internet research I was pretty convinced that the Croc would be the best buy in this price range. However, I am not very happy with it as it does not perform as good as Amika. It dries out my hair and still leaves my hair frizzy while straightening. With Amika I always end up with silky smooth straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kolkata

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product but it broke after a year - ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but it broke after a year - the plates are starting to pop out causing hair to get stuck/pulled. And of course, it was just outside of the warranty. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had this iron for more than 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this iron for more than 2 months and the temperature is already fluctuating. I've used a croc flat iron for years and this seems to be an ongoing issue
customer_reviews.author: heather strauss

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this straightener and I’ve tried a lot! Love love love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Moston

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally dropped and broke this model on a very hard floor after a few years of use. When I went to replace it, I saw a much cheaper flat iron with great reviews and purchased that instead. That model does not hold a candle to this one. After a few weeks I gave up on it. It could not tame my frizzy hair where the Croc has always worked quick, easy and effective. I replaced the cheap flatiron with another Croc. Its working great! Even with an accidental drop.
customer_reviews.author: lesliegolf

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN LESS THAN A YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in Dec 2018, don't even use it once a week. Does NOT WORK, quit working, won't turn on as of Oct 5, 2019. Can't return, warranty is not good because I bought it from AMAZON. DO NOT BUY THIS IRON!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three units in five years--what a Croc!
customer_reviews.text: For this amount of money, the equipment should last more than a year. What's worse is that my wife has now gone through three of these units in the past five years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this iron!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for about 10 years before it died. Tried another brand and returned it to buy this. I love this iron. I love the adjustable temperature. It is also light weight and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: momof4actors

customer_reviews.title: The BEST hair straightener I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This straightener gets my hair so straight in one or two passes. The temperature is steady and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best flat iron there is.
customer_reviews.text: Best flat iron there is. No other straightener makes my hair come out this smooth and also is a great tool for long lasting curls. You get to adjust the heat too and it makes a fun noise when you turn on and off like a video game. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Re

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I just got my second one The fit one I ordered on Amazon 7years ago and have been using professionally for Keratin
customer_reviews.author: svetlana duquesne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Didn’t last 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Croc brand but I’m so disappointed with this one. I’ve only had it for 5 months and it’s already broken. Yesterday it was working fine and today, it won’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Verina Ghaly

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron because my hairdresser uses it on me, I asked her the name and told me it was CROC! So I bought it. So far I’m happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena vega

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised-different product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the nano straightener, comes in a different box than the one pictured, and does not have silver plates-the plates are black
customer_reviews.author: jordan lambert

customer_reviews.title: Meets all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love my new flat iron. I usually buy the cheap ones, but decided to pay a little more and try this Croc after reading such good reviews. I was not dissappointed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Croc.
customer_reviews.text: I have own d a few Croc straighteners. I LOVE them. There is definitely something wrong with this one. When I am doing my hair and the cord naturally turns it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY AND BROKE
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the LESS THAN 1 YEAR that I owned it. SUPER PISSED, turned off while I was using it then I just threw it across the room on the tile and broke it straight in half. Screw this Iron, find something else that lasts !!!!!!!!!!!!! BAD PRODUCT !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Already Dead

customer_reviews.title: And the angels sang.....
customer_reviews.text: My previous straightener was less than $20 and pretty basic. I guess I expected angels to start singing when I used this new straightener. The morning I first used it, I thought "this is it???" I didn't see much difference from my old one. Then when I came home that night, I realized my hair looked basically the same as when I left that morning. And the angels sang...... My hair, which I will admit is straight anyway (but prone to flyaways), looks and feels better, and stays straight far longer than with my old straightener. My 17-year-old daughter even noticed and said my hair looked much prettier.
customer_reviews.author: ajr373

customer_reviews.title: and I couldn't love it more
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron gets so hot, hotter than any I have ever used before, and I couldn't love it more! The heat temp can be easily adjusted and the iron is very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: tahoe chickey

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this iron for about a year & half. It's a great iron but it just stopped working. Going back to my old Chi that is over 5 years old! After reading the reviews I am not going to buy another Croc. I want something that I can get 3 years out of.... at least.
customer_reviews.author: Mnt. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flat iron October 2018 and it no longer works. It’s been the same story with the last 4 that i have bought. Love the iron but they do not last very long!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Berna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best flat iron out. I’m a Natural chick and it gets my hair bone straight. Also works well for the wigs I sell.
customer_reviews.author: Brag Different Collection

customer_reviews.title: I love my Croc
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this product, and so far I really love it. My old iron seemed to be burning my bangs, but so far, no issues with this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCraney

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this sporadically for a few months. She really likes the way it functions, unfortunately this weekend it stopped working. Clearly a bad internal connection. We'll see how they handle customer service - she's going to attempt to invoke the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: futbolref

customer_reviews.title: Flat out fab!
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightener! I wanted to upgrade to a "nicer" flat iron, and bought this one after reading the positive reviews. My hair becomes very frizzy in humid weather, and my Croc has done a great job keeping my hair smooth throughout the day. Also love the auto-off feature. One less thing to worry about!
customer_reviews.author: Patty C

customer_reviews.title: Classic Croc
customer_reviews.text: The flat iron did a good job. It did straighten my hair leaving a nice shine. It's very light and doesn't require a lot of pressure to operate. It came in a nice black box. I would have loved to have had a mat with it. The packaging was very good and I received the flat iron within a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ladynefertitibk

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a regular flat iron for the longest time and was considering replacing it for a chi... We had slept over at a friends house and she had her croc classic nano-titanium flat iron for over a year and loves it. She had me try it first to see if I would love as much as she does, and I was absolutely astonished with the results... it made my hair soft, shiny and straight.... and I still had the same results the following day despite the bad weather conditions (humid and rainy!) My friend recommended buying it on amazon. Love amazon and their prices for great products!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Z.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My product melted, very very dangerous. Can get old of supplier to ask for refund. what to do?
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA HAWKINS

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend as it breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Croc. Each one only lasted about 18 monoths. I don’t recommend as it breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I loved the croc. Had it a littler over a year and it started making funny noises and not working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 2 years ago and it died on me today. For the money spent, I would expect it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Borst

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Straightener!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I love the digital display, and the whole product just seems high quality. I am definitely happy that I chose to spend the money on it. This morning my hair was totally crimped in 10 different directions from my hair-tie, and after a couple minutes with this thing it was totally straight. It's also super light, and easy to maneuver!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the reviews I read before ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews I read before buying. I learned my lesson. It worked for 5 months and then stopped heating. Turns on and shows temp but does not heat. Lots of money spent for just 5 months used
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hines

customer_reviews.title: negative reviews aren't lying, it stops working
customer_reviews.text: This amazing iron was well taken care of, but now it stops working on its own. I originally didn't mind the fact that I had to keep my eye on the digital display to turn it back on 10 times during the straightening process. But it gets to the point where I have to wait 5 minutes before being able to turn it back on again. that's really sad as I purchased 3 weeks ago. THREE.WEEKS.AGO
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Cord shorted out 2 months after I purchased it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cord shorted out 2 months after I purchased it. Had to hold cord a certain for it too work. Finally just through it away!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has auto shut-off, does not pull my hair, and heats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this to replace my Babyliss Nano and I love this straightener
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Babyliss Nano and I love this straightener. It heats up really fast and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Serena R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this to me and am super glad he did. I've had this flat iron for 2 years now and it still works great! I love how fast it heats up and the automatic shut down feature.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust510

customer_reviews.title: Croc straightener was recommended to me by my hairdresser
customer_reviews.text: Croc straightener was recommended to me by my hairdresser. I luv how smooth my hair gets from it. Doesn't need to be set very high so experimenting with temperature is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Kohana

customer_reviews.title: I want to return it and my money back ! Unhappy !
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and it does not work ! The paperwork that came with it looked like s previous owner had it . The warranty had been torn off .
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Engledow

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best flat iron purchase I've ever made. I still have it and it heats well. You can adjust the heat settings to what you are comfortable with. Very durable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NoeK

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 6 months. Then was bad.
customer_reviews.text: The black metal plates bubbled up after about 6 months and started stripping my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bails

customer_reviews.title: Straightens thick hair quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron. Works great and straightens thick hair quickly. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CROC Classic Nano-Titanium Flat Iron Black Hair Straightener | Silver Titanium Floating Plates, Dual Voltage Heat Up To 450℉ (Black)
product_meta.description:
CROC Classic Nano-Titanium Flat Iron 1.5 inch is a salon quality tool that will allow you to style like a pro. Equipped with silver titanium plates, the CROC iron is one of the fastest heating irons on the market. It's ideal to for eliminating and preventing frizz throughout the hair as it smooth down the cuticle and seals with heat providing the soft, smooth and silky look. With CROC Classic Flat Iron, professionalism and luxury collide in an ergonomic masterpiece. Utilizing 100% silver titanium floating plates, ceramic heaters, and an innovative ventilation system, this flat iron offers effortless glide with supreme performance. Achieve smooth, straight hair in one pass. The stationary plates are optimized for maximum straightening Enjoy creating vivacious curls, flips, or straight hair in less time with greater precision. Our company was founded by a stylist who wanted to redefine the industry by combining artistic experience with unique technology. His vision continues today. Features: • Produces negative ions, sealing cuticles, increasing shine. • Automatically decreases temperature to 370°F (180°C) when unattended between use. • Built-in ceramic heaters enable instant heat recovery, providing consistent heat during use. • Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use • 60% faster and more effective straightening utilizing the most advanced ceramic technology • Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design, and cool tip make styling more comfortable. • Temperature will instantly be back to the reserved temperature once in use again. • Combination of ATR keeps it safe and conserves energy. • Premium size plate • Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V] • With Fully digital temperature options ranging from 280F° – 450F° • Convenient 9FT swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. • Silver Nano-Titanium plates with ceramic heater seal moisture.

THE STORY OF CROC
Turbo Ion, Inc. DBA CROC is a leading research and innovations company in the hair care and beauty industry.
